text: hi everybody my name's Esther and in

days right they're always going

computer but actually that's not the
right word in English in proper English
the word is laptop now that word comes
from lap which is when we sit down the
part of our legs that folds right and
top meaning on top of we can put that

write a book with paper maybe lines on

in Korea people call it a note or note
to write but that's not correct again
this is a notebook and the computer that

ok so let's look at a couple examples

on my laptop
that means I'm typing a letter right I'm

and what Koreans call a notebook the

a couple years ago I had a Korean friend
and she told me that she bought a

was really surprised I thought what's so
special about this notebook I couldn't
imagine any notebook even if it had gold
on it right I couldn't imagine any
notebook costing that much and when I
asked her why would you pay that much
for a notebook she told me it was
actually very cheap for a notebook and
as we got to talking I that's when I
realized that it's not a notebook that
we write on with pen and paper or pencil
but actually a laptop computer and
that's how I first learned about the
difference between a laptop and a
notebook so next time make sure that
when you guys are going to a computer
